sentences.english: Amorphophallus Campanulatus Powder, Soya Bean Fibre, Starch, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 魔芋粉，大豆纤维，淀粉，素食调味料。

sentences.english: The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维为魔芋精粉或海藻酸钠粉。

sentences.english: The dynamic growth rhythm of Amorphophallus rivieri was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 对魔芋动态生长规律进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: Browning rule and persified color stabilizing methods in fresh konjac tuber process has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新鲜魔芋块茎天然褐变红色素固色方法。

sentences.english: To study the purgation effect of Mannose oligomer in Amorphophallus konjac.
sentences.chinese: 研究魔芋低聚甘露糖对小鼠的通便作用。

sentences.english: Basic jelling agent had high effect on the solidifying of the solution of konjaku flour.
sentences.chinese: 碱性胶凝剂对魔芋精粉溶液的凝固有很大影响。

sentences.english: Its distinctive smell can be detected from half a mile away.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦魔芋花独特的气味在半英里外就能闻到。

sentences.english: Arum was an Egyptian god with a Ram's head .
sentences.chinese: 魔芋是埃及的神与羊的头。

sentences.english: Browning rule and diversified color stabilizing methods in fresh konjac tuber process has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新鲜魔芋块茎天然褐变红色素固色方法。

sentences.english: Objective To approach inhibition effect and influence upon immune function of Amorphophallus Konjac for EAC.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨魔芋对肿瘤的抑制作用及对免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: The application of complex konjac gum in jelly processing were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以复配魔芋胶为胶凝剂在果冻生产中的应用。

sentences.english: Purification of konjac glucomannan by alcohol in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文用乙醇沉淀法纯化魔芋葡甘露聚糖做了介绍。

sentences.english: This study provided a new tool for rapid reproduction of Amorpho- phallus.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为魔芋的快速繁殖提供了新的手段。

sentences.english: The enzyme which arouse the browning of AK and AA is polyphenol oxidase.
sentences.chinese: 引起白魔芋和花魔芋褐变的酶均为多酚氧化酶。

sentences.english: The enzyme which arouse the browning of AK and AA is polyphenol oxidase.
sentences.chinese: 引起白魔芋和花魔芋褐变的酶均为多酚氧化酶。

sentences.english: The technology of the amorphophallus rivieri freeze dry powder is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种魔芋冻干保健食品技术。

definition: enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
